properties.name: Current home
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite I currently live here with an Italian, two Germans, one Peruvian, one Venezuelan & one Japanese. Since I moved here last year in September, there were 2 other Germans and one Dutch lived here. They are interesting personalities. This is really a change since I had lived for about 7 years almost alone in The Netherlands.

properties.name: Dinner for 2 euro
properties.description: Posted by BlackonwhiteHere I can have dinner for 2 euro every Tuesday & Thursday and have a nice conversation (mostly in Dutch) with some other students while eating. Once a month there is also an international dinner. For 3 euro, there I can meet students from different countries in the world, dine & wine.

properties.name: First attempt to live alone
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite I had made two attempts to live on my own during my student days in the university, but after a month or two I went back to my parents\' home. In this place at least I managed to live for several months, the longest before I graduated and found work.

properties.name: First home in The Netherlands
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite After living in a hotel for 2 weeks, I moved to this apartment with 2 former colleagues of mine in November 1999. After several months all of them moved to other places, and I lived here alone until the end of 2001. It is a big place, 3 sleeping rooms, with kitchen an a living room, 1 toilette and a bathroom. And pretty cheap too, I paid only 500 gulden per month.

properties.name: First working place in The Netherlands
properties.description: Posted by BlackonwhiteI worked here for almost 2 years.

properties.name: Flew from the nest
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite I got a job in 1996 after graduated, and I rented my room here with my own salary.

properties.name: Garage 1
properties.description: Posted by BlackonwhiteI parked the car on the small road to the entrance of the garage (on the ground floor). It was a scary place, where broken windshields were a common occurence. Then I got a magnetic card to park in the garage. But still I saw broken windshields in the garage. You cannot be too careful here.

properties.name: Garage 2
properties.description: Posted by BlackonwhiteI then got a magnetic card to park my car here. I felt much better here.

properties.name: Garage 3
properties.description: Posted by BlackonwhiteThis was the safest place to park my car in the area. Ironically I could park here only when I was no longer working in the building.

properties.name: Good cook
properties.description: Posted by BlackonwhiteAn interesting couple lives here. One of them is a good friend of my former housemate. Her partner is a very good cook. (Well, if you are not a very rich guy, you need something else to beat off the competition, of course).

properties.name: Good old student days
properties.description: Posted by BlackonwhiteThe most beautiful period in my life. I studied, fell in love, and finally graduated.

properties.name: Grammar school
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite This is where I studied since our family moved from Bandung. I didn\'t like this period very much. Some students made fun of me and I felt pretty much alone most of the time.

properties.name: Hang out place
properties.description: Posted by BlackonwhiteHere where I go almost every day.

properties.name: High school
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite This is where I studied for the last 3 years before entering university. I didn\'t like this period. I felt like a stranger almost all the time. The last year was a bit better.

properties.name: Home for 6 months
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite My former landlord asked me to leave on 1 January 2002. And I found a place to stay where I lived for 6 months together with the landlord, a former rebel from a South Asian country and an old American Dutch who was born in the city before World War II.

properties.name: Home for one month
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite I lived here for one month in April 2005. I was thinking of studying in Universiteit van Amsterdam the next September, and acquintance of mine offered me to stay at his attic studio while he was taking vacation in Indonesia. Eventually I decided to study in Universiteit Maastricht.

properties.name: Home in The Hague
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite I moved here in the summer of 2002 when I got a job in Delft. It is cold in winter, and I have got hypothermia several times.

properties.name: Junior High School
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite I studied here for 3 years and learned to like history. The teacher was really fun, he made history class like a story telling class and not a boring lesson.

properties.name: Kitty Hawk
properties.description: Posted by BlackonwhiteI found an aircraft carrier!

properties.name: Master study
properties.description: Posted by BlackonwhiteThis is where I am studying since last year. The most beautiful period in my stay in The Netherlands.

properties.name: Negev Nuclear Research Center
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite

properties.name: Old nest
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite I used to live here before I moved to the Netherlands.

properties.name: Second home
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite Our family moved here for one more year. My brother was born here. We moved back to Bandung.

properties.name: The first two weeks in The Netherlands
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite I arrived on 2 November 1999 in The Netherlands with 5 other former colleagues of mine. For the first two weeks we stayed in this hotel. It is pretty nice place.

properties.name: The second office in The Netherlands
properties.description: Posted by BlackonwhiteI got a new function and moved here almost 2 years after I came to The Netherlands.

properties.name: Very first home
properties.description: Posted by Blackonwhite I was born in this city. We lived here before we moved to Jakarta when I was 7 years old.
